plugins.name: bug-detective
plugins.description: Systematically debug issues with step-by-step troubleshooting approaches.

plugins.name: retrospective
plugins.description: Adds a /retrospective command that captures session learnings and prepares a Skill PR to the team registry.

plugins.name: advise
plugins.description: Consult the team registry to surface warnings, proven configurations, and shortcuts relevant to the current task.
